name: Beat Bongo hills without dying and without taking damage while getting all cages
Beat mr sax with only 12 punches and without getting hit
Get all cages in anguish lagoon in 1 go without leaving the level.
Get the helicopter powerup while having exactly 4 cages in total
Take the skops photographer, then get all cages in reverse order
Fall for 6 seconds without dying
Do allegro clip twice within 5 tries
Kill viking mama twice in a row with only taking 1 damage boost to do so
Beat Pencil Pentathlon without running nor helicoptering in screens 1 and 3
Beat TSoF without punching any plum
zip somewhere other than bongo 3
Grimace 150 times
Kill 10 tall living stones without using punch
Fully game over
Finish first screen of mr. sax as small rayman
Hit Mr. Stone 6 times while having atleast 3 dogs alive all the time.
Beat allegro presto without having the ring grab powerup
Softlock the game
Get all cages in EAJ in reverse order
Beat Space Mama while having exactly 23 cages
Beat the final screen of PP without walking off of slippery platforms
Enter Anguish Lagoon for the first time with 13 lives and 5 cages
In MSS get from the photographer to the end sign while only using 1 punch
Get the bongo hills dark screen cage without using helicopter, tethering and speedlocking
Kill 50 living stones (small or tall) in 1 screen without getting hit
